meanings.definition: The act of deleting or removing something.
meanings.sent1: She made a deletion of the unnecessary paragraph in the document.
meanings.sent2: The deletion of the old files freed up space on the computer.
meanings.sent3: During the game, the player accidentally pressed the deletion button and lost all progress.
meanings.sent4: His deletion of negative thoughts helped him feel more positive.
meanings.sent5: The deletion of the incorrect answer made the final result accurate.

meanings.definition: The process of eliminating or erasing information.
meanings.sent1: The deletion of the email was necessary to protect privacy.
meanings.sent2: After the deletion of the virus, the computer ran smoothly again.
meanings.sent3: The deletion of the embarrassing photo saved her from embarrassment.
meanings.sent4: His deletion of the outdated data improved the efficiency of the system.
meanings.sent5: The deletion of the wrong contact number caused confusion.

meanings.definition: The removal of a section of text or data.
meanings.sent1: The deletion of the paragraph changed the entire meaning of the story.
meanings.sent2: After the deletion of the code, the program worked perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The deletion of the wrong ingredient made the recipe taste strange.
meanings.sent4: Her deletion of the unnecessary details made the report clearer.
meanings.sent5: The deletion of the wrong address caused the package to be lost.
